trends: There have been no other sightings in Fairview

divs: Sighting Detailsi waz in the car with my bro when i looked at him i saw the lights and i told him look at the lights and he did and made a u turn and the lights were their and it waz clear that it waz not a plane it waz not a heilcopter it waz 2 ufos and outher people were looking up at it then i told him lets go i had some fear in me but i know about alot of things i have family in the military i have been around alot of military air craft and it waz not of this earth what i saw
Summary: 2 oval ufo not moving next 2 each other west of the town
